nodes.text: Ah, a student of the arts is a rare thing in this world. Perhaps there is hope for you yet. Each song is long in time. Which would you like to hear?
I must rest. This teaching drains much from me. Good luck to you.
I must rest. This teaching drains much from me. Good luck to you.
You have no need of my talents. You have taught peaceful people the ways of war. I mourn for them now.
I fear I have spent myself far too much. I am sorry.
I can teach you the ways of the old bards and minstrels.
I must rest. This teaching drains much from me. Good luck to you.
I am skilled in many of the languages and arts. Perhaps you would like  to learn one of those?
You do not convince me. I think you seek to use my gifts for ill.  Good evening.
As you see fit. May the future soften your heart and broaden your mind.
You see Amber, a teacher for the Followers.
You are an apt learner. May your trials be light. Go in peace.
You need not be rude. Apologize now, or I won't teach you.
Peace and Beauty are all I can teach. I am sorry that those are not appealing to you. Good day.
You are an apt learner. May your trials be light. Go in peace.
Now is when I rest. Please, come back during the evening.
Welcome noble traveler. Have you come here to study?
I am truly sorry to hear that. The Followers believe in peace at all costs. For that reason, I have renounced violence. Good evening.
Ah, we have here a student of life. In a case like this, I can teach you some herbalism, but training takes a while for little result.
I must rest. This teaching drains much from me. Good luck to you.

links.text: In the Wake of the Shadow.
I was hoping to learn something that may help me more.
I would be honored to hear a song.
I'm sorry, but I need to know things which will help me survive.
Can you teach me anything else?
Perhaps I can listen to a song or two.
I have no time for that type of stuff. I'm gone.
I am sorry. Will you please teach me?
No. I really came here just to kill things.
Depends on what you want to teach me.
Yes, I am willing to learn.
Sorry, I really don't have time for plants. Goodbye.
Please, teach me what you can.
